context:
Beads description:
Stacked/overlapping avatar component based on Temani Afif's technique (codepen.io/t_afif/pen/mdoyOqb). Static version without hover animation. Uses CSS mask with radial-gradient for circular cutouts, flexbox for layout, and CSS custom properties for sizing (--s for size, --o for overlap amount).

Reference: https://css-tricks.com/responsive-list-of-avatars-using-modern-css-part-1/
